{A Playground Game
If you are bored why not play hide-and-seek? To play a proper game you need from 5 _ 15 players. You pick someone who counts to a particular number _ like 100. He/she counts, while you and your friends find a decent hiding-place. Once the counting is finished, he/she will let you know by shouting{" Here I come, ready or {not, it's not my fault if you get {caught." } You remain in the hiding-place until he/she comes. If the catcher does not see you, run out and touch the den and say {"1,2,3, NOT HET"}If you are caught , then you have to count and everyone else has to hide.
